data.title: Argyle Independent School District
data.text:
School starts for ALL Argyle ISD Campuses on Wednesday, August 14! Visit our back-to-school site for all the essential information you need for the new academic year. On the site, youâ€™ll find details on upcoming events, school supply lists, registration, attendance policies, handbooks, transportation, meals, athletics, and more.

Click here to access the full back-to-school site and get prepared for a great year ahead!
